00025 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00026 #include <stdlib.h>

00036 #include <yyast/node.h>
00037 #include <yyast/header.h>
00038 #include <yyast/count.h>
00039 
00040 ya_t ya_header(ya_t *document_node)
00041 {
00042     // This is executed after the document was parsed, because the document is passed as an argument.
00043     ya_t    header;
00044     ya_t    filenames = ya_get_filenames();
00045 
00046     header = YA_BRANCH("yyast", &filenames, document_node);
00047     ya_clear_position(&header);
00048     return header;
00049 }
